live_updates: We continue to face restrictions that prevent us from accessing our equipment to complete repairs due to wildfire activity.  When we receive any new updates, we will ensure to post that information here.  Thank you for your continued patience.
Due to safety concerns in the area, our technicians are not currently able to access our equipment to restore services. Further updates will be provided tomorrow as they become available.
Technicians continue to await clearance to access the site and continue repairs. Further updates will be posted when they become available to us.
